name: Hundred
instruction: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your legs parallel to the floor, lift your shoulders off the mat and extend your arms and legs. Inhale for a count of 5, then exhale for a count of 5 while simultaneously pumping your arms up and down. Repeat until set is complete.
hints: Engage your core and back muscles and keep your lower back pressed against the floor. Coordinate your breath with the up and down movement of the arms.
